Attacks.Name: Ember
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, this character may make a free Move action.

Attacks.Name: Smokescreen
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range. That character subtracts 1 die from its attack rolls until the end of its next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Blaze
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 2 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of its Fire-type attacks by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Flame Cloak
Superpowers.Effect: This character gains immunity to the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Flame Wheel
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Rollout
Superpowers.Effect: Cyndaquil immediately makes a move action. During this move, it can move through characters without penalty and any character it moves through suffers 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Quilava character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
